author: striker
msg: * INSTALL
Update this doc to reflect we require neon version 0.21.1.

author: gstein
msg: * Makefile.in: toss out some unused crap

author: kfogel
msg: More work on issue #517; thanks to Ben C-Suss for help.
Note that this code is not useful until the editor->close_edit() calls
have been moved out of the RA layer and into libsvn_client.  If anyone
has feedback on that, please comment now.  My overall plan is to
- Edit svn_ra.h to explicitly promise that do_checkout(),
do_update(), and do_switch() will not call close_edit().
- Make all the ra layers not call close_edit() :-).
- Make libsvn_client call close_edit(), but only after it calls
svn_wc_edited_externals() to learn what externals changed and
deal appropriately, in the checkout, update, and switch cases.
Comments welcome.
[Note: The above plan was altered, based on Greg Stein's suggestions
in this mail:
From: Greg Stein <gstein@lyra.org>
Subject:  Re: svn commit: rev 2074 ...
To: dev@subversion.tigris.org
Message-ID: <20020603183411.E2689@lyra.org>
-Karl, Wed 5 June 2002]
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(struct edit_baton): New fields externals_old, externals_new.
(make_editor): Initialize them.
(externals_prop_changed): New helper function.
(close_directory): Record changes to the externals property.
(svn_wc_edited_externals): New accessor function.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h
(svn_wc_edited_externals): New prototype.

author: rooneg
msg: * build/buildcheck.sh: allow use of neon 0.21.1.  i'm not requiring it because
the changes seem minor and the API doesn't seem to have changed.

author: brane
msg: * libsvn_client/commit_util.c: Update file name in comment at top of file.
(svn_client__do_commit): Silence signed/unsigned warning on Windows: make
common_len a size_t, which is what strlen should be returning.
